TITLE: Music Rights Management
WELCOME: Welcome to the Music Industry Platform!
DESCRIPTION: Manage your rights, connect with artists, and expand your network.

HERO.TITLE: Build Clarity Into Your Music Rights
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Keep every composition, split, and rights holder organised in a single workspace. Invite collaborators, document agreements, and export ready-to-sign protocols in minutes.
HERO.NOTE: Many additional clearance, licensing, and collaboration tools are in development and will arrive shortly.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: Adding your catalogue is straightforward
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP_ONE_BODY: Sign up, create a workspace, and tailor it for your catalogue or organisation structure.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP_TWO_BODY: Upload new works, capture key metadata, and connect writers or performers with precise ownership splits.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP_THREE_BODY: Use QR codes or invites to bring collaborators in, agree on splits, and export protocol-ready PDFs whenever you need them.

STATS.TITLE: Trusted by a growing community
STATS.ERROR: We could not load the latest numbers. Check back soon.

AI_DISCLOSURE_FORM.TITLE: AI disclosure (legal requirement)
AI_DISCLOSURE_FORM.HINT: Inform collaborators and collecting societies where AI helped in the creative process.

OPTIONS.NOTES_PLACEHOLDER: Context for contributors, clearance notes, prompts...

VALIDATION.TITLE: Update required
VALIDATION.INSTRUCTIONS: Artwork, visuals, music, mixing, and mastering: For artwork and visuals, specify the AI tool or model used. For music, clearly indicate whether any of the following elements were created fully or partially with AI: lyrics, melody, harmony, arrangements, lead vocals, backing vocals, instrumental parts, or sound effects. The same applies to mixing and mastering.
VALIDATION.TOOL_REQUIRED: {{ section }}: Please specify the AI tool used.

RIGHTS_HOLDERS.TITLE: Rights holders
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.NO_RIGHTS_HOLDERS_DESCRIPTION: Add artists, composers, producers, and publishers to manage splits
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search by name, email, IPI, CMO...
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Name must be at least 2 characters long
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.CMO_HINT: Collecting society or performing rights organization
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.IPI_HELP_BODY: The Interested Party Information identifies you with collecting societies and PROs. Use only digits (9–11) with optional hyphens.
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.IPI_HINT_DEFAULT: If you already have an IPI, enter it to simplify later reporting.
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.IPI_HINT_FORMAT: IPI must contain 9–11 digits. Remove spaces or letters.
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.IPI_HINT_FALLBACK: We could not verify this IPI, but you can continue and confirm it later.
RIGHTS_HOLDERS.TAX_ID_HINT: Tax number or value added tax identification number

GDPR.COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies.
GDPR.COOKIES_DETAILS: Your privacy is important to us. Learn more about how we use cookies and how you can control them.
GDPR.ESSENTIAL_DESC: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
GDPR.ANALYTICS_DESC: Help us understand how you use our website so we can improve it.
GDPR.MARKETING_DESC: Used to track your activity and personalize content and ads.
GDPR.THIRD_PARTY_DESC: Used by external services to enhance functionality.
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_DESC: Get a copy of all your personal data in JSON format
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_DESCRIPTION: Generate a secure archive containing your profile, workspaces, works, rights holders, and associated records.
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_SUCCESS: Export ready. Check your download folder for the JSON file.
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_FAILED: We could not export your data. Please try again.
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_FOOTER: Need help? Contact support if something is missing from the export.
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_WARNING_TEXT: Deleting your account permanently removes all your data from our systems. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. Please make sure you have exported your data before proceeding.
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_PROFILE: ✓ Your complete user profile and account information
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_WORKSPACES: ✓ All workspaces you own and your memberships in other workspaces
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_RIGHTS: ✓ All rights holder profiles associated with your account
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_SPLITS: ✓ All work split percentages and agreements
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_PROTOCOLS: ✓ All protocols, authorship statements, and neighboring rights data
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_CONSENTS: ✓ All consent records and privacy settings
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_IRREVERSIBLE: This action is permanent - your data cannot be recovered after deletion
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_COLLABORATORS: If you are a member of shared workspaces, only your membership will be removed
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_EXPORT: We recommend exporting your data before deletion if you want to keep a copy
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_EXPORT_PROMPT: Need a copy of your data? Export it first:
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM_TEXT: This is your last chance to cancel. Once you confirm, your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted within minutes.
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM_TYPE_HINT: Type the word DELETE (capital letters) to activate the delete button
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ERROR_GENERIC: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again or contact support.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO_TEXT: Music Rights Platform ("we", "us", "our" or "Company") operates the Music Rights Platform website and application. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our service.
PRIVACY.PASSION_PROJECT: This is a passion project – Not a commercial service
PRIVACY.PASSION_1: This platform is a personal, non-commercial project created by an individual.
PRIVACY.PASSION_2: It is not a registered company, LLC, or legal entity.
PRIVACY.PASSION_3: There is no dedicated support team, customer hotline, or service level agreement (SLA).
PRIVACY.PASSION_4: Features, availability, and functionality are provided on a "best-effort" basis only.
PRIVACY.PASSION_5: We make no warranties regarding reliability, availability, accuracy, or fitness for any particular purpose.
PRIVACY.NO_LIABILITY: No liability for damages or losses
PRIVACY.NO_LIABILITY_TEXT: By using this platform, you acknowledge and agree that we assume NO responsibility or liability for any losses, damages, data loss, or other consequences arising from your use of this service. Use entirely at your own risk.
PRIVACY.GDPR_COMPLIANCE: Although this is a passion project, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable European data protection laws.
PRIVACY.INVITE_TITLE: Invite-only access & right to refuse service
PRIVACY.INVITE_ACCESS: This platform is invite-only and is currently in closed beta. Access is granted at our sole discretion.
PRIVACY.INVITE_1: Registration may require an invitation code or manual approval.
PRIVACY.INVITE_2: We do not guarantee access to everyone who requests it.
PRIVACY.INVITE_3: Your access may be revoked at any time without prior notice.
PRIVACY.WE_RESERVE: We reserve the right to refuse service
PRIVACY.RESERVE_1: We may refuse, suspend, or terminate access for any user at any time for any reason.
PRIVACY.RESERVE_2: We are not obligated to provide explanations for refusal or termination.
PRIVACY.RESERVE_3: We are not liable for consequences of account suspension or termination.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_1: This service is experimental, may change, and may be discontinued without warning.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_2: There is no entitlement to continued access or availability.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_3: We make no promises regarding feature availability or data persistence.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_4: Using this platform is a privilege, not a right.
PRIVACY.CONTROLLER_TEXT: The data controller responsible for your personal data is the platform operator.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: For privacy inquiries, use the in-app support function (if available).
PRIVACY.GDPR_REQUESTS_TEXT: For GDPR requests, contact us through the methods above. We will respond within 30 days.
PRIVACY.DPA_TEXT: You may contact your local data protection authority with concerns.
PRIVACY.VOLUNTARY_TEXT: We collect information you voluntarily provide:
PRIVACY.ACCOUNT_INFO_TEXT: Email, password (hashed), display name, optional profile photo.
PRIVACY.PROFILE_INFO_TEXT: Name, pseudonym/nickname, IPI, ISNI, PRO/CMO, contact details.
PRIVACY.WORK_INFO_TEXT: Song titles, ISWC codes, ISRC, release dates, collaborators, splits.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_INFO_TEXT: Composer, lyricist, publisher, performer details, roles, AI disclosures.
PRIVACY.SPLIT_INFO_TEXT: Split percentages, signatures, QR codes, PDF protocol documents.
PRIVACY.USER_RESPONSIBILITY: You are solely responsible for the accuracy of the information you upload.
PRIVACY.NO_VERIFY: We do not verify the accuracy of user-provided data.
PRIVACY.AUTO_PURPOSE: This data is used for functionality, security, debugging, and improvements.
PRIVACY.MUSIC_TEXT: We collect music rights management data:
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_TEXT: Artist names or aliases you use professionally.
PRIVACY.IPI_TEXT: Unique identifier assigned by collecting societies.
PRIVACY.ISNI_TEXT: International Standard Name Identifier for contributors.
PRIVACY.CMO_TEXT: Your affiliation with organizations like GEMA, ASCAP, PRS.
PRIVACY.AI_TEXT: Whether AI was involved in work creation.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_1: We generate a unique profile_id for each user.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_2: You can create a nickname linked to your profile_id.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_3: Nicknames are publicly visible if your profile is public.
PRIVACY.AI_DISC_1: You can indicate whether a work used AI tools.
PRIVACY.AI_DISC_2: This information appears in public work metadata and protocols.
PRIVACY.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: We are NOT a substitute for legal advice or professional music publishers. This is a tool for personal record-keeping.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: We process your data based on:
PRIVACY.BASIS_CONTRACT_TEXT: To provide our service (account creation, storing works, protocols).
PRIVACY.BASIS_INTEREST_TEXT: To improve the platform, ensure security, prevent fraud.
PRIVACY.USAGE_TEXT: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
PRIVACY.USAGE_3: Generating protocol documents and QR codes.
PRIVACY.NO_ADS: We do not use your data for advertising and do not sell it to third parties.
PRIVACY.NO_GUARANTEES_TEXT: We make no guarantees regarding data accuracy or platform availability.
PRIVACY.SHARING_TITLE: When and how we share your information
PRIVACY.SUPABASE_2: Processed data: Email, passwords, profiles, works, protocols
PRIVACY.AUTH_STORAGE_TEXT: Supabase uses tokens stored in browser localStorage for sessions.
PRIVACY.NETLIFY_1: Processed data: IP addresses, browser data
PRIVACY.PROVIDERS_DISCLAIMER: We cannot guarantee the security or availability of third-party providers.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_TEXT: When collaborating, your shared data is visible to collaborators.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_1: You control which information you share.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_2: We are not responsible for how others use shared information.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_REQ_TEXT: We may disclose information when required by law:
PRIVACY.LEGAL_1: Compliance with subpoenas or court orders.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_2: Enforcement of our Terms of Service.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_3: Protection of rights, property, or safety.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_LIMITATION: As a passion project, our ability to challenge legal requests is limited.
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_TEXT: Data is primarily stored in the EU. Some subprocessors operate globally with appropriate safeguards (Standard Contractual Clauses, GDPR-compliant DPAs).
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: We do NOT use traditional tracking cookies or analytics services.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_AUTH: Supabase uses secure tokens in localStorage for authentication.
PRIVACY.STORAGE_LOCAL: This data remains on your device.
PRIVACY.NO_TRACK_TEXT: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or similar tools.
PRIVACY.FUTURE_CHANGE: If we add analytics, we will update this policy and obtain consent.
PRIVACY.QR_1: We request temporary camera access via browser permissions.
PRIVACY.QR_2: Camera stream is processed locally in your browser. No video uploaded.
PRIVACY.QR_3: If a QR code contains a protocol ID, we query our database.
PRIVACY.QR_4: We do not store camera images or videos.
PRIVACY.RETENTION_TEXT: We retain data only as long as necessary.
PRIVACY.DELETION_TEXT: You can request deletion of your account at any time.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_1: Data is retained while the account is active.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_2: Personal data is deleted within 30 days.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_3: Shared work metadata may remain visible to collaborators.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_4: Backups remain for up to 90 days.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_5: Data subject to legal investigations is retained until resolved.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_6: Server logs are retained for up to 12 months.
PRIVACY.DISCONTINUE_TEXT: Upon discontinuation, we will make reasonable efforts to notify users and enable data export.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_1_TEXT: Request a copy of your personal data.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_4_TEXT: Limit how we use your data.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_5_TEXT: Receive your data in machine-readable format.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_6_TEXT: Object to processing based on legitimate interests.
PRIVACY.EXERCISE_1: Contact us using the information in Section 3.
PRIVACY.LIMITATIONS_TEXT: Certain rights may be limited by legal obligations.
PRIVACY.COMPLAINT_TEXT: File complaints with your local data protection authority.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_4: Regular updates: Security patches are applied.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_LIMITS: No system is 100% secure. We lack enterprise-grade security measures. Use at your own risk.
PRIVACY.BREACH_TEXT: We will notify you and authorities within 72 hours of a breach.
PRIVACY.CHILDREN_TEXT: This service is not intended for persons under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from children.
PRIVACY.WARRANTY_TEXT: THIS SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES.
PRIVACY.WARRANTY_LIST: We make no warranties regarding availability, accuracy, data backup, or legal validity of documents.
PRIVACY.USE_RISK: You use this platform entirely at your own risk.
PRIVACY.LIABILITY_LIST: Direct, indirect, consequential damages; Loss of data, revenue, or profits; Errors or violations; Downtime or interruptions; Actions of third parties.
PRIVACY.LIABILITY_ACK: This is a free, experimental project. We bear no legal responsibility. Seek commercial alternatives if you need guaranteed reliability.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: We may update this policy. Changes will be posted with an updated "Last updated" date.
PRIVACY.CONTINUED_USE: Continued use after changes means acceptance.
PRIVACY.BY_USING: By using the Music Rights Platform, you acknowledge:
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_1: This is a passion project, not a commercial service.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_2: No guarantees for availability, accuracy, or reliability.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_3: We are not liable for damages or losses.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_4: We may refuse or terminate access at any time.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_6: You accept the risks of using an experimental platform.
PRIVACY.NO_AGREE: If you do not agree, do not use this service.
PRIVACY.NO_SUPPORT: No dedicated support team. Responses may be delayed.
PRIVACY.USE_INAPP: Use the in-app support function or contact info in Section 3.
PRIVACY.DPA_CONTACT: Contact your local data protection authority:
PRIVACY.FOOTER: This is a passion project. Use at your own risk.

PUBLIC_PROFILE.IMPORT_COLLABORATOR: Import this collaborator into your current workspace.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.SIGN_IN_TO_ADD: Sign in and select a workspace to add this collaborator.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.ALREADY_IN_WORKSPACE: This collaborator is already part of your workspace.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_1: Use the QR code in the app to adopt this profile directly into split sheets.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_2: All shared information respects the artist's privacy settings.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_3: After adding, you can customize roles, percentages, and identifiers for each work.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.NO_PROFILE_FOUND: No profile found for this handle.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.UNABLE_TO_LOAD: Unable to load this profile at this time.
